TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi FlowDocumentReader extends System.Windows.Controls.Control implements class System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild
Public Class FlowDocumentReader Inherits Control Implements IAddChild
public ref class FlowDocumentReader : System::Windows::Controls::Control, System::Windows::Markup::IAddChild

summary.span: 提供一种查看流内容的控件，该控件内置了对多种查看模式的支持。

span.span: Provides a control for viewing flow content, with built-in support for multiple viewing modes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包括功能，使用户能够动态各种查看模式，包括单页面 （页上的每一次的） 查看模式，两个--a-次一页 （书本阅读格式） 查看模式和连续滚动 （无界限） 查看模式之间进行选择。 includes features that enable the user to dynamically choose between various viewing modes, including a single-page (page-at-a-time) viewing mode, a two-page-at-a-time (book reading format) viewing mode, and a continuous scrolling (bottomless) viewing mode. 如果不需要能够动态不同的查看模式之间切换，有的轻量级流内容查看器中使用特定查看模式修复。If you do not need the ability to dynamically switch between different viewing modes, there are lighter-weight flow content viewers that are fixed in a particular viewing mode. 在单页面查看模式下，显示流内容和在连续滚动模式下显示流内容。 displays flow content in single-page viewing mode, and displays flow content in continuous-scrolling mode. 有关可用的显示模式的详细信息，请参阅。For more information about available display modes, see . 下图显示控件及其默认[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]。The following figure shows a control with its default [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]. ![具有标注的屏幕快照： FlowDocumentReader](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-main.png "具有标注的屏幕快照： FlowDocumentReader")![Screenshot with callouts: FlowDocumentReader](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-main.png "Screenshot with callouts: FlowDocumentReader") - **内容区域**的内容区域中显示的内容指定的属性。**Content Area** - The content area displays the contents of the specified by the property. - **工具栏**-默认工具栏是否停靠在内容区域的下方。**Tool Bar** - The default toolbar is docked underneath the content area. 它承载控件的搜索的内容，页面导航、 选择查看模式中，并将更改的缩放级别。It hosts controls for searching content, navigating pages, selecting a viewing mode, and changing the zoom level. - **查找按钮**-**查找**按钮将打开查找对话框，使用户能够搜索的内容指定的词或短语。**Find Button** - The **Find** button brings up a Find dialog, which enables the user to search the contents of the for specified terms or phrases. **查找**按钮不会显示如果是`false`。The **Find** button is not shown if is `false`. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . - **页面导航控件**-页面导航控件包括一个按钮，用于跳转到下一页 （向下箭头） 或前一页 （向上箭头），以及当前页码和总页数的指示符。**Page Navigation Controls** - The page navigation controls include a button to jump to the next page (the down arrow) or previous page (the up arrow), as well as indicators for the current page number and total number of pages. - **查看模式按钮**-查看模式按钮使用户能够选择从可用的查看模式。**Viewing Mode Buttons** - The viewing mode buttons enable the user to select from available viewing modes. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . - **缩放控件**-缩放控件使用户能够增加或减少的缩放级别，通过单击加号或减号按钮，分别。**Zoom Controls** - The zoom controls enable the user to increase or decrease the zoom level by clicking the plus or minus buttons, respectively. 缩放控件还包括一个用于调整缩放级别的滑块。The zoom controls also include a slider for adjusting the zoom level. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 默认的工具栏[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]不包括**打印**按钮。The default toolbar [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] does not include a **Print** button. 是的唯一允许的子元素。 is the only allowable child element for a . A元素可以承载不能超过一个。A element can host no more than one . ## Examples 下面的示例定义前面图中。The following example defines the pictured in the preceding figure. [!code-xaml[FloaterFigureSnippets#_FloaterFigureXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FloaterFigureSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_floaterfigurexaml)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Find() cil managed

span.span: Toggles the Find dialog.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]包括**查找**切换查找对话框的按钮。Default [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] includes a **Find** button that toggles the Find dialog. 下图显示查找对话框上具有默认 UI。The following figure shows the Find dialog on a with default UI. ![具有标注的屏幕快照： FlowDocumentReader](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-find.png "具有标注的屏幕快照： FlowDocumentReader")![Screenshot with callouts: FlowDocumentReader](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-find.png "Screenshot with callouts: FlowDocumentReader") 默认的查找对话框包含一个用于输入搜索文本字段，以及用于按钮**查找下一个**，**查找上一个**，和**选项**。The default Find dialog includes a field for entering search text, as well as buttons for **Find Next**, **Find Previous**, and **Options**. 默认情况下提供了以下查找选项：The following Find options are provided by default: - 仅全字匹配。Match whole word only. - 匹配大小写。Match case. - 匹配音调符号。Match diacritic. - 匹配 kashida。Match kashida. - 区分 alef hamza。Match alef hamza. 调用此方法不起如果属性是`false`。Calling this method has no effect if the property is `false`.

summary.span: 获取或设置 允许的最大 级别。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum allowable level for the .

span.span: The maximum allowable level for the , interpreted as a percentage.

value.span: 默认值是 200.0（最大缩放比例为 200%）。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]包括滑块，可以用于调整级别。The default [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] includes a slider that can be used to adjust the level. 此属性指定的上限值滑块。This property specifies the upper-limit value for the slider. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置属性。The following example shows how to set the attribute. MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnKeyDown(class System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnKeyDown (e As KeyEventArgs)

param.name: e
param.span: 提供与事件有关的数据。

span.span: Provides data about the event.

summary.span: 每当未处理的 附加路由事件在其路由中发生在一个从此类派生的元素上时，就会调用此方法。

span.span: Invoked whenever an unhandled attached routed event reaches an element derived from this class in its route.

summary.span: 实现此方法可为此事件添加类处理。

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 击键的专用输入管理器来处理。Keystrokes are handled by a dedicated input manager. 其他编程功能，依赖于如输入和命令之前被视为常规击键公开，绑定可能将处理击键的击键。Other programming features that rely on keystrokes such as input and command bindings will potentially handle the keystroke before it is exposed as a general keystroke. 如果这些输入系统功能将已处理，则该事件标记将不会调用。If these input system features mark the event handled, then will not be invoked. 此方法不具有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 仍建议在实现中调用 base （），以防在继承中的中间类实现此方法。Calling base() in your implementation is still recommended, in case an intermediate class in the inheritance implemented this method. 你可以调用 base （） 之前或之后你特殊的处理，具体取决于你的要求。You may call base() either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements. 此方法的目的是某种程度上类似于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 它提供了一种用而不是一个实例处理程序的类处理程序的派生类中对匹配事件进行处理。The purpose of this method is somewhat similar to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: it provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes with a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下匹配的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的路由事件，因为路由的事件可能遭到一个子元素，不一定的元素，将会调用处理程序，以便您的实现将需要采取的事件自变量的源引发将属性转换为帐户 （和不应尝试再次引发该事件在大多数情况下）。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because the routed event may have been raised by a child element, not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers, so your implementation will need to take the event arguments' source properties into account (and should not try to re-raise the event in most cases). 子类可以选择在路由过程中收到事件时调用私有类处理程序方法。Subclasses of could choose to call private class handler methods when the event is received along the route. 一个可能的方案是事件的参数，将该事件标记为已处理。One potential scenario is to take the arguments of the event and mark the event as handled.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PageCount As Integer
public: property int PageCount { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取由 承载的内容的当前显示页的数目。

span.span: Gets the current number of display pages for the content hosted by the .

value.span: 由 承载的内容的当前显示页的数目。

span.span: The current number of display pages for the content hosted by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 流内容没有任何固有的概念是固定数量的页面; 例如：内容动态组织成一组显示页的数目取决于当前的显示和布局特征。Flow content does not have any inherent notion of a fixed number of pages; the contents of a are dynamically organized into a set of display pages, the number of which is based on current display and layout characteristics. 例如，调整大小或更改级别会影响显示页的内容被组织成各个数。For example, resizing a or changing the level affects the number of display pages that the content is organized into. 当处于查看模式时，页计数和当前页码始终是 1 （假定已加载的任何内容）。When the is in the viewing mode, the page count and the current page number are always 1 (assuming any content has been loaded). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

summary.span: 调用标准的“打印”对话框，此对话框可用于打印 的内容和配置打印首选项。

span.span: Invokes a standard Print dialog which can be used to print the contents of the and configure printing preferences.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]不提供**打印**按钮。The default [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] does not provide a **Print** button. 下图显示标准的打印对话框的示例。The following figure shows an example of a standard Print dialog. 请注意，打印对话框的特定外观可能会有所不同具体取决于宿主计算机的配置。Note that the specific appearance of the Print dialog may vary depending on the hosting computer's configuration. ![屏幕快照: 打印对话框](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-print.png "屏幕快照： 打印对话框")![Screenshot: Print dialog box](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-print.png "Screenshot: Print dialog box") 调用此方法不起如果属性是`false`。Calling this method has no effect if the property is `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Input.RoutedUICommand SwitchViewingModeCommand
Public Shared ReadOnly SwitchViewingModeCommand As RoutedUICommand

summary.span: 获取表示“切换查看模式”命令的值。

span.span: Gets the value that represents the **Switch Viewing Mode** command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类具有为此命令的内置处理 （以及对大量的应用程序和导航命令的内置处理）。The class has built-in handling for this command (as well as built-in handling for a number of application and navigation commands). 发出命令和命令绑定的详细信息，请参阅[命令概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md)。For more information on commanding and command binding, see [Commanding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md). 而是不是启动此命令，你可以改为调用对相关。Rather than initiate this command, you can instead call on the relevant . 结果是相同的。The result is the same. **切换查看模式**命令可以是无参数，在这种情况下查看模式前进到下一步中的可用的查看模式枚举序列，也可以通过命名指定查看模式中命令参数。The **Switch Viewing Mode** command can either be parameterless, in which case the viewing mode advances to the next available viewing mode in the enumeration sequence, or it can specify a viewing mode by naming the in the command parameters. 如果用于设置中的命令属性[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，此命令必须无参数。If used to set a command property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], the command must be parameterless. 你无法使用，或响应在派生类中，此命令使用内置处理或将其替换自己的处理。You could also use or respond to this command in a derived class, using either the built-in handling or replacing it with handling of your own. 可用于更改类的回调处理，而无需对命令绑定模板中或在实例中的更改。 is a callback that you can use to change the class handling, without requiring changes to command bindings in the template or in instances. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage ```

summary.span: 获取或设置当前缩放级别。

span.span: Gets or sets the current zoom level.

value.span: 当前缩放级别，以百分比表示。

span.span: The current zoom level, interpreted as a percentage.

value.span: 默认值为 100.0（缩放级别为 100%）。

span.span: The default value 100.0 (zoom level of 100%).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]包括提供的按钮可为增加或减少缩放，以及一个用于调整缩放级别的滑块缩放控件。Default [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] includes a zoom control that provides buttons for increasing or decreasing the zoom, as well as a slider for adjusting the zoom level. 下图显示缩放控件上具有默认 UI。The following figure shows the zoom controls on a with default UI. ![FlowDocumentReader 内容缩放](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-zoom.png "FlowDocumentReader 内容缩放")![FlowDocumentReader content zoom](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-zoom.png "FlowDocumentReader content zoom") 值约束的缩放级别和属性。The zoom level is constrained by the values of the and properties. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置属性。The following example shows how to set the attribute. [!code-xaml[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentReaderXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_flowdocumentreaderxaml)] 下面的示例演示如何设置属性以编程方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentReader](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_flowdocumentreader)] [!code-vb[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentReader](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_flowdocumentreader)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double ZoomIncrement { double get(); void set(double value); };

span.span: Gets or sets the zoom increment.

value.span: 当前缩放增量，以百分比表示。

span.span: The current zoom increment, interpreted as a percentage.

value.span: 默认值是 10.0（缩放增量为 10%）。

span.span: The default is 10.0 (zoom increment of 10%).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 缩放增量是依据百分比级别增加或减少时或执行命令，分别。The zoom increment is the percentage by which the level is increased or decreased when the or commands are executed, respectively. 默认[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]包括提供的按钮可为增加或减少缩放，以及一个用于调整缩放级别的滑块缩放控件。Default [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] includes a zoom control that provides buttons for increasing or decreasing the zoom, as well as a slider for adjusting the zoom level. 下图显示缩放控件上具有默认 UI。The following figure shows the zoom controls on a with default UI. ![FlowDocumentReader 内容缩放](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-zoom.png "FlowDocumentReader 内容缩放")![FlowDocumentReader content zoom](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-zoom.png "FlowDocumentReader content zoom") ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置属性。The following example shows how to set the attribute. [!code-xaml[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentReaderXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_flowdocumentreaderxaml)] 下面的示例演示如何设置属性以编程方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentReader](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_flowdocumentreader)] [!code-vb[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentReader](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_flowdocumentreader)]
